properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 6 at 11:22AM EST until February 6 at 5:15PM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in BLACKSBURG has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Stokes County in north central North Carolina...
Northwestern Rockingham County in north central North Carolina...

* Until 515 PM EST

* At 1121 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rainfall rates in excess of 2 inches per hours across the
warned area. Up to one inch of rain has already fallen with an
additional half inch to inch possible over the next few hours.
Flash flooding is expected to begin shortly.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Eden...
Wentworth...
Mayodan...
Madison...
and Walnut Cove.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small
creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying
spots.

When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding,
including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service
by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and
pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service
Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 5:15 PM EST. Avoid flooded areas.
